watches.description: The Rolex Submariner is known for its water-resistant design and is ideal for divers.
The Omega Speedmaster, also known as the 'Moonwatch,' was used during the Apollo missions.
The Tag Heuer Carrera is a luxury sports watch inspired by motor racing.
The Patek Philippe Nautilus is a premium watch known for its unique design and high-quality mechanism.
The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak stands out with its luxury steel case and revolutionary design.
